name: Head in the Clouds (mehketou)
description:
Thank you to Arcade Classic Font · 1001 Fonts for the score font!

Head in the Clouds- A game about daydreams.

It's quite barebones and buggy at the moment, and any criticisms are welcome. 

Tip: spam press the Glide button to keep your altitude!

Leave your highest scores in the comments below!
